participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, he enjoys music and values family despite his challenges.
participant_1.background: whats up i'm a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i prefer being inside. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. i am a recording engineer and own my own studio.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Active and health-conscious, she enjoys working out and having fun with her pets.
participant_2.background: i've short hair. i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. two dogs live with me. eating is something i do when i am bored.

content.text: I am 22 and still in high school are you a vegan?
I am a vegan, but i do not like meat.
I love fish. I am not a vegan though. Do you like riding horses?
I am in new york. How about you?
Its nice. I am a vegan.
